lines: Okay, um. Uh, so let’s do like a smash cut okay? I’ll just kick it off okay, smash cut.

speaker: Clint
lines: You step into the installation… installation. Um, this room is bisected into two halves with, uh— by a large thick transparent wall. On the left side is like a big pumping device, and Grace is standing there prepping that machine. On the right side are these large tanks. Joe, or the periodical table, is standing there prepping it. In the middle of the wall is a large, impressive-looking metallic door. But the room that you’re in when you first walk in is kind of dominated, there’s a circular table right in the middle of the room, on this half of the room.

speaker: Travis
lines: And is that also a character? Are all tables characters, or just some of them?

speaker: Clint
lines: No, no. But the computer bank… standing there is Potts.

lines: See? Your [laughter] your iconography, the rules of it are so— I don’t know what is object and what is person. But I love it.

lines: And there are great big cylinders on the other side of the machine where Joe had been. But the room is dominated by three pads, three circular pads on the floor that look like they’re like covered with a kind of mesh, a very fine mesh. And over each one of those pads is an array of metallic arms with a nozzle at the end of each one. And that is directly over those pads. Um, Grace hands you a, uh, kind of skullcap thing to place over your heads, and there are earbuds in the skullcap. Also, a pair of goggles each and a respirator with a built in microphone.

lines: Okay, gang, we’re getting ready. Now let me just explain to you what’s gonna happen so you don’t completely freak out. Moderate freaking out is okay. Those nozzles up above you are going to spray what we call Skinthetic, which is a version of Nadiya’s artificial skin.

lines: When they activate the pumps, the Stimplants fill the chamber, in the air. And are immediately attracted to your golems and start working their way into the actual Skinthetics and— think of it as, like, a medium. The Stimplants enter your [Travis Could I have a large?] bodies.

lines: Alright, so it— there’s a different timeframe for everybody. As we watch, from the control room, we can see seams starting to appear in Remy’s golem, and, large chunks of it just start sloughing off and falling to the ground. And when that happens—

lines: [gasp] Go go’s…

lines: When that happens, the nozzle array over Remy withdraws and raises up into the ceiling.

lines: I fall to my knees, ‘cause I imagine that was pretty exhausting and disorienting. And I just kinda stay there on my knees for a little bit. And then I look up. And with both hands, I touch my temples, and open my eyes wide and just yell and

lines: [imitating laser noises] Byew! Byew! Byew!

lines: All of a sudden, places start appearing on Irene’s golem. They look like sparks. But they’re moving around on the surface of the golem. And when that happens, Irene’s nozzle array starts to withdraw, like Remy’s did. But when they move, the sparks move to the top of the golem’s head and points at the nozzle array. And there’s a pulse and this surge of electricity, an arc of electricity shoots up and hits the nozzle array.

lines: The sparks are moving around. This time, they are facing Remy. They all come together into that one spot. And when that happens, at the same time, Remy, you feel that tingling sensation give like a huge surge. All through your body.

speaker: Remy

speaker: Nadiya
lines: I’m a little, uh… distracted [Remy Okay.] if I’m going to be honest. There’s uh… a lot going on… right now. But, uh, I will do what I can. In the meantime, you could maybe draw her fire?

speaker: Remy
lines: Uh— Oh yeah! Seems like it’s attracted to movement. I can do that.

speaker: Griffin
lines: I run over just towards Irene and start, I dunno. I do a flip right in front of Irene trying to move around more than Nadiya is, to try to attract the fire.

speaker: Clint
lines: The sparks shift to the other side [Griffin Okay.] and there’s a pulse, and another arc of electricity starts to head your way.

speaker: Griffin
lines: I roll out of the way of it. [Clint Alright.] That’s a fucking 10.

speaker: Clint
lines: Excellent. Yeah, you—

speaker: Travis
lines: You roll so good, you become Sonic the Hedgehog.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah, I literally go supersonic with that one.

speaker: Clint
lines: The lightning arc, instead, hits the wall, and this time the lights flicker and go out.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Oh my god.

speaker: Clint
lines: And Potts says

speaker: Potts
lines: Irene? Irene…

speaker: Clint
lines: In the darkness, you hear that sloughing sound again, and the lights come back up. Justin, what do we see?

speaker: Kardala

speaker: Remy
lines: Who the— who is this? Who are you?

speaker: Kardala
lines: My name is Kardala, little man, and I have been freed from the Irene prison, and I demand meat.

speaker: Remy
lines: Does anybody— can you— Two things I don’t have any meat. I’m basically nude right now, but also, please stop shooting lightning at all of us.

speaker: Kardala
lines: Oh. Of course.

speaker: Clint

speaker: Potts
lines: Remy, the filaments are almost cleared, and security is on the way [Kardala grunts], but if anything happens to Nadiya while she’s still in golem form—

speaker: Justin
lines: [crosstalk] Irene rips out her earpieces. Er, sorry, Kardala rips out her earpieces. No way.

speaker: Potts
lines: Remy, we can’t let her harm Nadiya in any way, shape, or form until she comes out of the golem. It would be fatal.

lines: Little man, you will direct me to meat or you will be meat, or you will— is this your prison? Have you created this prison for me?

speaker: Kardala
lines: I understand you are afraid of the demon. I, too, have been shook to my core— ah, just kidding, little man, I am not afraid. Shall I destroy it for you?

lines: [panicked] No?

lines: And Irene starts— Kardala starts to walk over to smash Nadiya.

speaker: Griffin

speaker: Remy
lines: No! Nononono, not a demon. Everything’s good, that’s my—

speaker: Kardala
lines: Look at it.

speaker: Remy
lines: Yeah… No, it’s— it’s skin all over, and it’s moving around and stretching around all weird and that’s— but that’s I think normal and we are super good here and I— I have jerky? You know jerky, like, it’s like old meat. It’s good as hell, though. I have a lot of that back in my dorm, so I’ll swing by and get you some of that here in like, five minutes, tops.

speaker: Kardala
lines: I am famished for… I cannot count the days. I have watched the world through the prison of Irene Baker, and now I am finally free and I wish nothing more than to dine on flesh.

speaker: Remy
lines: Flesh?!

speaker: Kardala
lines: But, I can be patient.

speaker: Remy
lines: Good.

speaker: Clint
lines: On the other side of the wall, back in the control room, Martine and Sylvane enter the monitor chamber with weapons drawn.

speaker: Kardala
lines: Mmm! Okay.

speaker: Clint
lines: Martine says

speaker: Martine
lines: Open the hatch, Pottsy.

speaker: Clint
lines: And Potts refuses.

speaker: Kardala
lines: Pottsy, I would listen to them. Open the hatch. This hatch.

speaker: Remy
lines: Uh. Don’t do that, not ‘til Nadiya’s awake. Nadiya, can you hear me— can you, like, finish molting or whatever?

speaker: Kardala
lines: Who is Nadiya? Where is she?

speaker: Remy
lines: She’s the demon one, you thought she was.

speaker: Clint
lines: You hear Joe in your earbuds

speaker: Joe
lines: Nadiya, listen to me. For some reason the Skinthetics seem to be reacting with your body. You are not going to be able to reject the Skinthetic. It will not slough off. You— It seemed to be reacting to your arm for some reason.

speaker: Nadiya
lines: Oh, yeah. I have the— the skin graft, um. This is unexpected. Give me a second.

speaker: Travis
lines: I would like to roll Will.

speaker: Clint
lines: Okay.

speaker: Travis
lines: Oh wait, I have a program that does that. Not great. But uh, a two? So, fair. [Clint Okay.] I’m going to— because— okay, so here’s why I’m doing this. What Nadiya knows about her creation, the BioSkin — the Skinthetic, as you were calling it — is that it reacts to your body. It becomes part of your body, so if this is doing a skin — if it’s attracted to the skin graft that she already has, she’s trying to somehow, you know, make it become part— work with her body instead of against it.

speaker: Clint
lines: Okay, I like that. Your body starts to actually absorb the Skinthetic. Over on the other side of the wall, Martine said— instructs Sylvane, and Sylvane goes over and restrains Potts—

speaker: Remy
lines: [crosstalk] Hey hey hey hey! C’mon!

speaker: Clint
lines: [crosstalk] pulls Potts away, pulls Potts away from the controller. Martine starts punching buttons to open the hatch.

speaker: Nadiya
lines: Give me… just one more minute. I think I’ve almost got it.

speaker: Clint
lines: Joe says

speaker: Joe
lines: You and your fella do not run things here, Martine. Three department heads here say give ‘em time.

speaker: Clint
lines: And Martine says

lines: I’ll give you one minute. I’m the one department head with a gun.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You gonna shoot everybody? Ya ding dong?

speaker: Clint
lines: Nadiya, you need to roll— I say roll Will again to see if you can stabilize.

speaker: Travis
lines: I’m gonna roll Science!

speaker: Clint
lines: Okay…

speaker: Griffin
lines: Eat that skin!

speaker: Travis
lines: [dice rolling noise] Oh wait, I have a program—

speaker: Griffin
lines: Why— you just forgot it within the span of, like, 90 seconds.

speaker: Travis
lines: Okay but I did— I rolled a three. Three pluses and a blank.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Ohh, it’s not in the program— [Travis I know] that’s why we’re using the program—  specifically for Travis.

speaker: Travis
lines: But I rolled three pluses, and a blank, plus four, so seven.

speaker: Clint
lines: Okay.

lines: Do these guys have guns drawn on Kardala?

speaker: Clint
lines: On the other side of the hatch, yeah.

lines: Uh oh.

speaker: Justin
lines: Through the glass, right?

speaker: Clint
lines: Yeah, but that’s why she wants to open the hatch— they couldn’t shoot through the glass.

lines: Can I see that— is it like a transparent situation or I can, I can see.

speaker: Clint
lines: It is transparent, yeah.

speaker: Justin
lines: Okay, Kardala walks up and smashes the— punches the glass as hard as she can with her fists.

speaker: Clint
lines: Okay.

speaker: Justin
lines: Sorry it’s just like, it is untenable, that they would have guns drawn on her.

speaker: Clint
lines: Okay.

speaker: Justin
lines: Okay it’s a negative one, and I guess this would be…

speaker: Griffin
lines: Uh, Physique. Or— yeah.

speaker: Justin
lines: Physique?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Or Fight?

speaker: Justin
lines: Or Fight… fighting—

speaker: Griffin
lines: [crosstalk] Physique is like feats of strength. I don’t think it’s fi— I think it would be Physique.

lines: Physique, okay. So three minus one, so a two. Which according to the Fate ladder is…

speaker: Travis
lines: Fair!

speaker: Justin
lines: Fair.

speaker: Clint
lines: Okay. The uh, the transparent wall… splinters, spiderwebs. At that point, the hatch pops open and Martine says

lines: She holsters her weapon, instructs Sylvaine, he holsters his weapon. She says

speaker: Kardala
lines: I demand battle!

speaker: Martine
lines: It’s comin’. Trust me. But not now! We need to get you skimmin’ and in the air in one hour!

speaker: Travis
lines: Um, I am going to, like a cinder block, punch Martine with my new giant polymer fist. And that would be a five.

speaker: Clint
lines: Alright, that hits her. [Griffin laughing] Hits her—

speaker: Kardala
lines: [excited] Yes!

speaker: Clint
lines: Doesn’t hurt her.

speaker: Kardala
lines: This demon craves battle! I like this demon!

speaker: Clint
lines: Uh, and she sprawls out on the floor, Sylvain draws down on you.

speaker: Nadiya
lines: [sarcastically] Sorry— Sorry about that. Um. I was just….really angry, and… huh. I see. Interesting. Wasn’t expecting that at all, huh.

lines: You can turn your body into a rock like the Kirby power?

lines: Apparently…?

lines: Do another rock! Do a different— can you be a big—

lines: Uh… yeah lemme see, hold on. Uh… name a weapon.

lines: Uh… two swords.

lines: Okay.

lines: Spear.

lines: I— I’ll do the two swords first.

lines: Well, do spear first, because she gets angry real fast.

speaker: Nadiya
lines: Okay. Spear. Let’s see…

speaker: Travis
lines: Will plus two… so six? Form a spear with one hand. Mmm… shield maybe? So that’s an eight to form a shield with the other hand.

speaker: Nadiya
lines: Huh. Interesting. Oh! Uh, yes.

speaker: Travis
lines: I help [chuckles] Martine up.

speaker: Nadiya
lines: Sorry!

speaker: Clint
lines: And she smiles at ya, she wipes away a little blood that came out of her nose, and Martine says—

lines: I like it. Nice job, everybody! [Nadiya Yeah.] Now get ‘em ready, they’re in the air in one hour.

speaker: Kardala
lines: Who shall I punch?

speaker: Remy
lines: No— let’s— can somebody meat her? Get her some meat? This is— she has sort of a one track mind about- hey, by the way, is Irene just gone? What happened?

speaker: Kardala
lines: Irene is a prison [Remy Mhm, yeah.] that was constructed to keep me, Kardala—

speaker: Remy
lines: [disheartened] She was actually pretty cool.

lines: It- can we, can we talk to Irene- is Irene in there?

speaker: Kardala
lines: Sure, go ahead. Ask Irene something.

speaker: Remy
lines: Irene, what’s your favorite movie?

speaker: Kardala
lines: [pretending to be Irene] I love to watch movies [Remy Okay, so it’s—] and I eat popcorn also!

speaker: Remy
lines: I think Irene’s gone.

speaker: Kardala
lines: That was a trick!

speaker: Clint
lines: [Laughs]

speaker: Remy
lines: Hey, Kardala, I just also like wanna know what are you, is this like a Jekyll and Hyde situation? Is- is th- ar- what’s goin’ on?

speaker: Kardala
lines: My name is the thunder goddess Kardala, you may call me Kardala.

speaker: Remy
lines: Cool.

speaker: Kardala
lines: I watch over people of the North, and protect them and serve bounty, but mainly I have been imprisoned for years inside a prison called—

speaker: Remy
lines: [crosstalking] Yeah, inside a prison called Irene, yeah.

speaker: Kardala
lines: —Irene Baker. You know of her, yes.

speaker: Remy
lines: Yeah.

speaker: Kardala
lines: Now I have been freed. And all I desire, at the moment, is meat. I will… figure out next steps after that.

speaker: Nadiya
lines: Big picture, okay. You know what, actually? I’m pretty hungry too. If we could grab a sandwich or something,[Kardala Yes!] I am now apparently human Silly Putty. Um, and it’s a lot to process, so.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Remy says,

speaker: Remy
lines: Uh, yeah, I can eat.

speaker: Griffin
lines: And I try to take a step towards the door, but I leap, like, 20 feet forward and crash into the wall, and I’m like

speaker: Remy
lines: Okay, I gotta recalibrate, I guess, my movement a little bit. I think I can jump super good, by the way, which, to be a little honest, is a little disappointing, ‘cause I did already know how to jump pretty good. And also like, I was an Olympic athlete, and I trained for that my whole life, and didn’t get weekends or a childhood, really, so if I knew that they could just sort of matrix super-jumping into you, I probably would have just, like. Wasted all of my time playing Yugioh cards— well, wasting more of my time playing Yugioh cards.

speaker: Nadiya
lines: To be fair, I thought I would become some kind of like. Well, I was going to say Reed Richards, and I guess that that is more—

speaker: Remy
lines: Yeah, the circle gets the square.

speaker: Nadiya
lines: Yeah. I meant in the super smart scientist way. But I think the stretchy way, I guess. Let me see.

lines: And she tries to stretch, and she cannot do that.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay.

speaker: Nadiya
lines: Okay, so n— I— Hmm. Mhmm, mhmm. Not… stretchy…

speaker: Remy
lines: Um, Potts, is there any way I can go again? And maybe see if I get heat vision this time? Or flight, or…?

speaker: Potts
lines: Well, no, but I’ll tell ya one thing, Remy. Our indicators show there’s still some powers being processed in your hands. So, maybe they’ll manifest themselves later on but—

lines: Heat beams! Pyow!

speaker: Griffin
lines: I stick my hands out [laser noises]

lines: Aw.

speaker: Potts
lines: Just Remy. Something, it’s— it’s just like some kind of energy flow, but it’s- it’s tough to tell. It may show up later, so we’ll just keep an eye on the situation.

speaker: Remy
lines: But it’s— it’s in my hands.

speaker: Potts
lines: Mhmm.

speaker: Remy
lines: In my haaands! Y’all know that one?

lines: Commitment theme fades in 3532]

speaker: Clint
lines: It’s an hour later. And you’re on a skimmer.

speaker: Travis
lines: Have we eaten?

speaker: Clint
lines: You’re zipping over the waves of the Gulf of Mexico, and there are hoagie, uh, crumbs and wrappers and strombolis and hot brown remnants— you’ve just eaten the hell out of a bunch of meat sandwiches.

lines: Little man, remind me. This one, strom- stromb—

lines: Stromboli.

lines: Stromboli. Yes.

speaker: Remy
lines: It’s Italian for “the good sandwich.”

speaker: Kardala
lines: I very much enjoy the stromboli.

speaker: Clint
lines: So. You’re zipping along. And um, of course, remember these are drones that are piloted back by a pilot on the Berg. So it’s just you three. But there is a monitor with a speaker. As you fly along, Parsons, who is the head of Risk Understanding, and basically makes the assignments, says uh

speaker: Parsons
lines: Hi everybody. I’m sorry that we, uh, had to put you in this situation—

speaker: Griffin
lines: God, that’s good.

speaker: Justin
lines: So good.

speaker: Parson
lines: — where, uh —

speaker: Travis
lines: Man of a thousand voices.

speaker: Parsons
lines: —you find yourselves in this— I apologize, but this is of immediate need. And you are the only intact superpowered trio we have at this time. We’re still doing the—

speaker: Remy
lines: [strained noise]

speaker: Nadiya
lines: Did they die?

speaker: Remy
lines: Yeah, intact is a horrible—

speaker: Parsons
lines: I’m sorry, uh, alive. You are the only three successful ones so far.

speaker: Remy
lines: THERE WAS A CHANCE OF UNSUCCESS?

speaker: Nadiya
lines: Yeah, wait—

speaker: Parsons
lines: Well, you knew the job was dangerous when you took it.

speaker: Remy
lines: WE DID NOT! We explicitly DID NOT know the job was dangerous when we took it!

speaker: Parsons
lines: You are on a rescue mission. And it’s of vital importance. You are going to recover— her name’s Mary. But we called her Space Cadet. Um, she was in the Diplomatic department. She was one of the first recipients of the Stimplant technology. And basically— uh, Mary is like a human WiFi network. Um, within the hundred yard space, she can basically connect to practically any kind of electronics and exert control over them. But, like I said, this was one of the first ones. And, um. There were some after effects that we did not anticipate—

speaker: Nadiya
lines: Is she evil now? Is that what’s going on?

speaker: Parsons
lines: No, no. [Nadiya [disbelievingly] Okay.] But the technology was not as refined, and her psyche was damaged.

speaker: Nadiya
lines: Mhmm.

speaker: Parsons
lines: And she fled. She fled the Berg without us knowing it. If she does not get proper treatment, her condition’s gonna deteriorate, and we’re afraid the paranoia will turn inward, and she may harm herself. We really don’t want that to happen. Now, as you know, we cannot remove the Stimplants, but we do have some treatments that will help her lead a normal life. Um—

speaker: Remy
lines: Does she have two folks with her, also? Giving her— isn’t this like a trio, a triumvirate situation?

speaker: Parsons
lines: Um. You’re right, Remy, but as far as we know, no. Nobody else from the program has left. Like I said, she was one of the first ones. And just when the powers activated with the other two, it just, it went bad for Mary.

speaker: Remy
lines: Um, quick clarifying question. Um, did you try marijuana once, and did you inhale? [Travis laughs]

speaker: Parsons
lines: Um, I did not inhale.

speaker: Remy
lines: Okay, fantastic.

speaker: Parsons
lines: But I also have a peanut allergy, so I’m not who you think I am.

speaker: Justin
lines: Oh, twist.

speaker: Parsons
lines: Now, Jamie, who works in my department too, I believe you met her at the mixer, um, as a matter of fact I believe that is who you had kind of a butting of heads with—

speaker: Nadiya
lines: Ah. Yes. [crosstalk] Bad with names, is Nadiya.

speaker: Parsons
lines: [crosstalk] Jamie and I suspect that Space Cadet has taken refuge in an abandoned theme park on the gulf of Louisiana— on the gulf coast of Louisiana. The park was built by her parents. Do you— you remember the televangelists Stan and Sally Sage? They were very big— they were, had their own TV network, and they were very, very successful, but they were indicted six years ago. Now, they opened this theme park and it shut down.

speaker: Remy
lines: Is it a religious-themed Noah’s Ark theme park?

speaker: Parsons
lines: It is a Bible-related theme park. [crosstalk] Every—

speaker: Remy
lines: [crosstalk] Excellent.

speaker: Parsons
lines: Every creature, every person that you see there, a lot of audio — a lot of animatronics, they are all from the Bible.

speaker: Nadiya
lines: Are we going to have to — I’m sorry. [heavy sigh] Are we going to have to deal with, like, robot Jesus and stuff?

speaker: Parsons
lines: Our intelligence does not extend that far.

speaker: Griffin
lines: [laughs] That’s a yes from Dad!

speaker: Parsons
lines: So I do not know.

speaker: Griffin
lines: That’s a hard Clint McElroy yes.

speaker: Nadiya
lines: Okay.

speaker: Clint
lines: Just then, the skimmer lands outside a very large sign, and right before the, right before the screen kicks off, you hear Parsons say

lines: Bring her home to us, please.

lines: No.

speaker: Remy
lines: Oh— okay—

lines: Little man, thank you for your story, if that was to be a story. I have no interest in… ”Mary.” I will depart on my own way, fare thee well to all of you—

lines: [crosstalk] Coward.

lines: I have a conquest beyond.

lines: That’s a terrible idea.

speaker: Kardala
lines: Ssssssorry, demon?

lines: Oh, I’m, I said “coward.”

lines: [crosstalk] Oh, Jesus.

lines: You’re running away, is what you said, right? So you’re quite the—

speaker: Kardala
lines: [laughs sinisterly]

lines: I’m walking backwards away from this.

speaker: Kardala
lines: The demon thinks Kardala a coward.

speaker: Nadiya
lines: No, it’s fine, I’ll just do it on my own. I don’t even need you, I mean, what could you possibly do to help? Um, Jump Boy and I will take care of it, and you—

speaker: Remy
lines: [crosstalk] Jump Boy is very good—

lines: [crosstalk] Just as she gets— she gets as far as “what could you possibly do to help?” and Kardala reaches her hands out of her, like, sort of long white cloak, and slaps them together and creates a gust of wind in Nadiya’s direction, um, which, let’s see, that would be… I guess Will, since it’s magic, basically. That is a zero, and that gets added to my Will which is a three… it says the opposition is generally fair with the, with creating a specific weather pattern, so, three would beat [Clint Yep!] the opposition. So I create a gust of wind towards her. Not like, you know, damaging, but basically, you know, super fast.

speaker: Clint
lines: Well Nadiya, what do you do?

speaker: Travis
lines: Oh, I take it. I’m— I am goading Kardala.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah, it’s definitely a reverse psychology situation.

speaker: Travis
lines: Yeah, yeah. I’m—

speaker: Clint
lines: Okay, I’d say— I’d say it knocks you back a few feet, [Travis Mmhmm.] maybe? Kinda staggers you. Does not knock you over, but it does definitely push you back, and when it pushes you back, it pushes you back against the hatch of the skimmer, and it pops open.

speaker: Nadiya
lines: Okay! So, are we all going, then?

speaker: Remy
lines: Yeah, I mean, I’m down, let’s just not antagonize the thunder god for, just like a general rule.

speaker: Kardala
lines: Do you, demon, admit now that you require the assistance of Kardala?

speaker: Nadiya
lines: [sarcastically] Yes, you know, I’ve seen the error of my ways, Kardala. Now I don’t think we can do this without you, thank you, so much, for helping us.

speaker: Kardala
lines: Look now how the demon begs!

speaker: Kardala
lines: Thus is the might of Kardala. Yes, you have convinced me. I take pity on you, lesser creature, and I will follow you to retrieve this… ”Mary.”

speaker: Griffin
lines: I get a stromboli out of the skimmer and I start, like, walking backwards with it, like, “this way!”

speaker: Kardala
lines: The thunder god is not a dog to be teased.

speaker: Griffin
lines: [crosstalk] Okay, I thought maybe it’d be like a—

speaker: Kardala
lines: [crosstalk] I will, however, relieve you of this stromboli.

speaker: Griffin
lines: I thought we might have a E.T. Reese’s Pieces situation on our hands, but I was mistaken.

speaker: Clint
lines: All right, you step out of the Skimmer and there’s a very large sign that says “Welcome to Halleluland!”

speaker: Griffin
lines: Oh, jeez. Literally.

speaker: Clint
lines: And there is a street of—

speaker: Justin
lines: Can I just say, I’m so glad you guys talked Kardala into that because there’s nothing I want to see more than the Bible themepark my Dad made!

speaker: Travis
lines: Yaaaaay!

speaker: Clint
lines: There is a gold road— it’s not real gold, or it would have been stripped by now— by the way, everything here is in slight disrepair.

speaker: Travis
lines: Oh, so it’s like my recurring nightmare of being in an abandoned amusement park. Thanks, Dad.

speaker: Travis
lines: This is great.

speaker: Justin
lines: Except there are apostles here!

speaker: Travis
lines: [crosstalk] Yeah!

speaker: Clint
lines: [crosstalk] I may put spiders in there, too, Trav, I know you love spiders.

speaker: Travis
lines: [crosstalk] Ah, cool! Can they be robot Jesus spiders?

speaker: Clint
lines: [crosstalk] So you walk along— you walk along this street of gold, and you come up to a gigantic wall, 50 feet high, with a giant white gate, which at some point probably was supposed to look like it was carved out of a single pearl, but, it’s fallen kind of into disrepair. But in front of this gate is a half of a statue. You see a large mechanical framework of a man, from like the waist up, arms outstretched, palms up, blocking you from getting to the gate. And as you approach, the eyes light up in this bizarre metal face. A lot of the— a lot of it has fallen apart, but you can still see the metallic, and you can still see the palms. The palms are like, you know, eight feet across, they’re huge. And a voice comes out of the head and says,

speaker: Robot
lines: Step up and tell me of your faith. In what do you believe?

speaker: Remy
lines: I mean, this is a very personal question, giant robot, I just met you—

speaker: Nadiya
lines: It’s Saint Peter.

speaker: Remy
lines: No, I get it.

speaker: Nadiya
lines: Okay, I just wanted to make sure that was clear. That’s what’s going on.

speaker: Travis
lines: Nadiya steps up.

speaker: Nadiya
lines: Uh, I believe in science, and learning—

speaker: Griffin
lines: [crosstalk] I’m just trying—

speaker: Clint
lines: [crosstalk] There’s no response, by the way.

speaker: Griffin
lines: I feel like Remy’s just like, what are we doing here? This is just a big animatronic guy, we’re, we don’t need to be talking to this right now, I feel like.

speaker: Saint Peter
lines: Step up and tell me of your faith. In what do you believe?

speaker: Clint
lines: And you notice that these two hands are equidistant above the ground, about three feet off the ground each, like scales.

speaker: Travis
lines: Yeah.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay, yeah.

speaker: Remy
lines: I mean, hard work and perseverance and dedication and loyalty and… any of these the password, or…?

speaker: Saint Peter
lines: [insistent] Step up—

speaker: Griffin
lines: [crosstalk] All right—

speaker: Saint Peter
lines: And tell me of your faith.

speaker: Griffin
lines: I jump up onto the left hand.

speaker: Remy
lines: I think we have to step up, literally.

speaker: Clint
lines: Good. When you do, the eyes light up and the voice says

speaker: Saint Peter
lines: Now, tell me of your faith. In what do you believe?

speaker: Clint
lines: And when you step up on that hand, it sinks to the ground.

speaker: Remy
lines: Nadiya, can you hop up, or Kardala, can you hop up in the other hand of this very scary—

speaker: Kardala
lines: I won’t hop.

speaker: Remy
lines: Can you climb up?

speaker: Kardala
lines: Yes. [Griffin chuckles] I shall be judged.

speaker: Saint Peter
lines: In what do you believe? Tell me of your faith.

speaker: Remy
lines: Jesus. Jesus and the Bible? Is that it?

speaker: Kardala
lines: Yes. Like the little man said. Jesus and the Bible.

speaker: Clint
lines: When you say that, your hand— the hand that Kardala stands on— sinks all the way to the ground.

speaker: Kardala
lines: Ah. You enjoy Jesus!

speaker: Kardala
lines: I…I love Jesus, and the Bible that he wields. So terrible. Very—

speaker: Clint
lines: He’s like a co-worker!

speaker: Kardala
lines: Yes. We called him Dave!

speaker: Griffin
lines: [laughing] Oh, jeez.

speaker: Clint
lines: Okay, Nadiya, what do you do?

speaker: Travis
lines: …I don’t know. [laughs] Um, so right now the hands are on the ground, right?

speaker: Clint
lines: No, no no, when Kardala got on the palm and activated it, the— it sank to the ground, and the hand that Remy was standing on raised up in the air.

speaker: Travis
lines: I walk under that hand.

speaker: Clint
lines: Okay.

speaker: Travis
lines: And I head for the gate.

speaker: Clint
lines: Still closed.

speaker: Travis
lines: I hit it really hard with the big hammer fist.

speaker: Clint
lines: [makes sound effect like something hitting a metal door] Wooonnngggg!

speaker: Kardala
lines: Yes!

speaker: Clint
lines: Nothing.

speaker: Kardala
lines: I will join the Demon in this path!

speaker: Justin
lines: Kardala hops off and goes to punch the gate.

speaker: Clint
lines: Remy goes right down to the ground in his hand.

speaker: Remy
lines: Ow!

speaker: Clint
lines: Wooonnnngggg!

speaker: Remy
lines: Okay. We can make the hands move, and that’s great. I think we have to balance it out, maybe? Like scales?

speaker: Justin
lines: Kardala goes back to the, her platform.

speaker: Remy
lines: Let’s both say Jesus at the same time? One, two, three, Jesus?

speaker: Kardala
lines: Yes, you count.

speaker: Remy
lines: One… two… three… Jesus!

speaker: Kardala
lines: [simultaneously] Jesus!

speaker: Clint
lines: Kardala’s hand goes down to the ground, Remy’s goes up in the air.

speaker: Remy
lines: Oh, my gosh.

speaker: Kardala
lines: We are both saying Jesus. Perhaps my faith is stronger than yours. I have spoken for many minutes about my love of Jesus and his terrible Bible. [others laughing] Perhaps your faith in Jesus is not as strong as Kardala’s.

speaker: Remy
lines: All right, Nadiya, get over here and talk about how great science is.

speaker: Kardala
lines: You must both believe in Jesus to equal my faith in— my newfound faith in Jesus.

speaker: Travis
lines: All right, Nadiya climbs up on the hand with Remy.

speaker: Kardala
lines: Speak of your love of Jesus, Nadiya!

speaker: Remy
lines: [muffled] Yeah, he’s great.

speaker: Saint Peter
lines: Tell me of your faith. In what do you believe?

speaker: Nadiya
lines: I believe in science.

speaker: Remy
lines: Je— Oh, I thought we were doing J— okay.

speaker: Clint
lines: And the hand that you are standing on starts to lower, and the hand that Kardala’s on starts to raise…

speaker: Kardala
lines: Now wait, who is science, and—

speaker: Justin
lines: No, I’m just kidding, Kardala knows what science is.

speaker: Clint
lines: [crosstalk] And the hand with Remy and Kardala— ah, I’m sorry, with Remy and Nadiya [Griffin Nadiya], slowly sinks down to the ground, but very slowly.

speaker: Remy
lines: All right, I’ll get off, and I think we’re supposed to be balancing sort of faith in science, at this point. Right? I think that’s what this statue is trying to get us to, to do.

speaker: Clint
lines: Someone could do an investigation check.

speaker: Travis
lines: Oh yeah!

speaker: Justin
lines: Yeah. Shit. Yeah. Not Kardala.

speaker: Travis
lines: Ok. So, uh, my Investigation is plus three, I rolled a zero, so that’s three.

speaker: Griffin
lines: I also got a three.

speaker: Clint
lines: Okay. You noticed that in the transition of the one arm coming down, when they were equidistant, when they were just about the same, the pearly gates started to hum and vibrate a little bit. But then when you sank the rest of the way down— now, this is with both of you on it—

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah, I’m getting— I’m getting off. I think that’s what we needed to do. Some—

speaker: Remy
lines: Kardala, you’re on that hand. Nadiya, you’re on that hand. Nadiya, you do all your science jazz—

speaker: Nadiya
lines: Okay.

speaker: Remy
lines: —and, Kardala, you talk about how great your, your best friend Jesus is, with his awesome “Bibe.”

speaker: Kardala
lines: Does anyone know anything else about Jesus? I feel like I’m beginning to repeat myself.

speaker: Remy
lines: Uh, he did— he made one fish turn into like a bunch of fish.

speaker: Kardala
lines: Aahh. This I can respect! Provider Jesus, the creator of fish! I love him very much, and I believe in him and his terrible, scythe-like Bible!

speaker: Remy
lines: And, Nadiya, what’s the best elements? Just start, just talk science and give me that jazz.

speaker: Nadiya
lines: I’m— I’m not a chemist, you know that—

speaker: Remy
lines: [crosstalk, strained] Just say some science stuff and how great it is!

speaker: Nadiya
lines: [crosstalk] Okay, okay, all ri- okay. Uh, I like lasers, and making fake skin, and polymers, and plastics, and microchips. Beakers and bunsen burners and stuff. I love science.

speaker: Clint
lines: As you speak, your hand sinks, sinks, sinks, and there’s a moment, again, where they’re the same distance off the ground—

speaker: Remy
lines: Get off, get off, get off!

speaker: Travis
lines: Then we get off, then we get off.

speaker: Clint
lines: And the pearly gates open.

speaker: Travis
lines: Hey, we did it!

speaker: Griffin
lines: Everything in moderation, folks.

speaker: Travis
lines: That’s why I believe in Science Jesus!

speaker: Clint
lines: All right, so you follow this street of gold past the pearly gates, and you’re walking around. You eventually come up to a very large clearing, and this clearing is full of wild— I mean, it’s overgrown, but it’s kind of this wild version of lilies of the valley. So this field is sprung up, overgrown, weedy, but you can still see the lilies of the valley. And, uh, you walk into this clearing, and…what do you do?

speaker: Travis
lines: Ok, I’m gonna do Notice.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah, I could also—

speaker: Travis
lines: Not great.

speaker: Griffin
lines: I got a one on Notice.

speaker: Travis
lines: I got a zero! I roll negative one, plus my one, equals zero.

speaker: Clint
lines: The only thing you really notice is that even though this is overgrown, you can still see the street of gold stretching on ahead to, uh, to a bunch of trees, and as you look, through the trees comes a woman riding on a unicorn.

speaker: Griffin
lines: This is the weirdest Bible place ever! Cause they definitely, I don’t think were in that one.

speaker: Clint
lines: And you hear a voice say,

speaker: Voice
lines: Isaiah 347, “And the unicorn shall come down with them, and the bullocks with the bulls, and their land shall be soaked up with blood—”

speaker: Griffin
lines: I was— I stand corrected.

speaker: Voice
lines: “And their dust made fat with fatness.”

speaker: Griffin
lines: There’s unicorns in the Bible, y’all! Had no idea!

speaker: Clint
lines: The unicorn trots up, and the woman gets off of the unicorn.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Is it a robot woman?

speaker: Clint
lines: It is a robot woman, yes. And as she walks up, you hear a voice speak, and the voice says

speaker: Voice
lines: Mark 622-25, “When the daughter of Herodius came and danced, she pleased Herod and his dinner guests, and the king said, ‘Ask me for everything you want and I’ll give it to you.’ And he promised her an oath ‘Whatever you ask, I shall give you.’ She went out and asked her mother, ‘What shall I ask for?’ And her mother said—”

speaker: Remy
lines: I know this one!

speaker: Voice
lines: “‘The head of John the Baptist.’”

speaker: Remy
lines: Aww.

speaker: Clint
lines: And at that point, the robotic woman pulls her hand out from behind her back and sure enough, she has the severed head of a man, her fingers tangled in his hair—

speaker: Griffin
lines: Happy Halloween, everybody!

speaker: Travis
lines: Is it a robot head?

speaker: Clint
lines: It’s a robot head.

speaker: Travis
lines: Okay.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Oh, okay.

speaker: Clint
lines: And the robot woman screams,

speaker: Robot Woman
lines: GET OUT!

speaker: Clint
lines: And when she says that, the eyes of the severed head opens and fix on you, and the head speaks

speaker: Severed Head
lines: I’d listen to her, fellas! She always gets what she wants, trust me!

speaker: Clint
lines: And the unicorn charges toward you.

speaker: [Theme music (The Adventure Zone
lines: Commitment Theme by Griffin McElroy) plays]
